item.title: Predictive Modeling with the 'OK Cupid' Dataset
item.description: The final project for Codecademy’s “Building a Machine Learning Model with Python” Skill Path asks students to do a little work with the “OK Cupid” datasetâ€”the project is humorously, punningly titled: “Date-A-Scientist.” Students were tasked with trying to build some models to make predictions on this dataset. A Jupyter notebook with all the code and results follows here:
